ConstructionState dataclass

class construction_state.ConstructionState(event_pos, event_code, part_id, deviated, misplaced, unnecessary, time_registered)

Bases: object

Used to describe a motion event that occurred at a position. Used in ProcessState to remember Motion Events in a MotionDict.

event_pos

Node position where motion event was detected.

Type: Pos

event_code

The Type of motion event.

Type: int

part_id

Part ID that was placed/removed.

Type: Pos

deviated

If action caused a process deviation.

Type: bool

misplaced

If part that was placed with action occupies a node where a different part was recommended.

Type: Pos

Type

Specifier if deviated

unnecessary

multiple attachments in a layout.

Type: bool

Type

Specifier if deviated

Type

If part that was placed is not necessary for the layout. For example

time_registered

Datetime of when event was registered.

Type: datetime
